name: Gaming all incl. -murder with steam
description:
This game was created during a game jam I worked on together with a good friend. The theme was "Nostalgia" and we had a week to develop a little game. Have fun!

Intro:

In the course of my research, I was suddenly surprised by the alleged murderer. He threatened me with a pistol but at an opportune moment I was able to escape through the window. Still on the fire escape, a projectile grazed me and shattered the lock of my briefcase.The briefcase popped open and all my research flew out in a high arc and spread all over the city. In order to convict the murderer, I need the complete research documents back. But I have to be on my guard, the murderer could be waiting for me anywhere.

JojoXGaming --> programming, small art-stuff, sounds

darliinehe --> game-art, animations

Fritz Herbst   --> music
